html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09182020-11-20,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder authorizing the Minister of Health to transfer, lease or loan any of the property that is necessary to support public health emergency management
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Health to TRANSFER, LEASE, OR LOAN, to any of the following assets in the public property that is necessary to support public health emergency management to any province or territory of Canada: (1) any body or person in Canada, any property that forms part of the National Emergency Strategic Stockpile; and (2) any drugs that form part of the Critical Drug Reserve.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order authorizing the Minister of Health to transfer, lease or loan any of the property that is necessary to support public health emergency management
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Health to TRANSFER, LEASE, OR LOAN, to any of the following assets in the public property that is necessary to support public health emergency management to any province or territory of Canada: (1) any body or person in Canada, any property that forms part of the National Emergency Strategic Stockpile; and (2) any drugs that form part of the Critical Drug Reserve.
